entry.title: New release for Teemii: Teemii v0.8.0
entry.content:
Teemii v0.8.0 codename: plume

Major change

Scrobbling Support

The 'Scrobbling' feature allow you to seamlessly integrate your manga reading experience with popular platforms like AniList and Kitsu. This functionality will enable users to synchronize their reading progress and manga lists between Teemii and these third-party services. Whether you update your reading status on Teemii or on AniList/Kitsu, the sync feature ensures that your progress is reflected across all platforms

A few details: - Synchronisation is limited to titles on Teemii. - Deletion on Teemii is not passed on to third-party services.

Fixes and Improvements

Improved: Reading progress is now calculated immediately for a chapter Improved: The progress indicator (in percentages) for a manga is shown on the manga page. Fixed: Volume correction in docker-compose Fixed: Invalid cast in the download indicator Fixed: Filtering was broken in the mangas vue
